cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it deals with policy gradient algorithms, which are a popular class of reinforcement learning algorithms used in machine learning. It also involves stochastic optimization, which is a common technique used in machine learning. 

It is also likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.RO (Robotics) as the paper specifically mentions the application of reinforcement learning to real-world control tasks, such as those arising in robotics. 

Additionally, it could belong to the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as reinforcement learning is a subfield of AI. 

It may also belong to the sub-category of cs.SY (Systems and Control) as the paper deals with control tasks and safety issues in learning on physical systems. 

Finally, it could belong to the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision) as the paper mentions the use of policies in robotics, which often involves computer vision techniques.
